# name

**Instance Property**

The user specified name of the service.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Rename services by calling the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMService/updateName(_:completionHandler:)] method with a value given by the user.

## Identifying the service

- **updateName(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the name of the service to the specified string.
- **uniqueIdentifier**: A unique identifier for the service.
